title: Hey guys. Anyone to play with? (Skins for fun too)
body:
Hey guys!
I am SKT1 Smash, a smurf of a level 30. I am currently level 11 and am wondering if anyone is up for a few games. It would be even greater if we had team skins (SKT, TSM, FNATIC, BLOOD MOON, ETC) but it would be fun just to have a buddy to win every game with. Add me in game / comment if you would like in!

Thanks!

replies.body: Hey!! I am looking for people to play with and would be keen! I don't have any skins yet though.
